content.detailedDescription: Driving to work in watertown ny i was approaching the dexter airport and was about 3/4 of a mile away.  i noticed that the beacon light at the airport was very bright, unusually luminescent.  i thought, hmmm, must be a new kind of bulb or something similar.  as i neared the airport the angle of view towards the beacon changed geographically, and i then noticed two sources of light instead of one.  (the ufo light was in line with the airport beacon earlier)  as i got closer and the lights became further distinct and separate i thought "what the hell is that?", as the nearer light was obviously the airport beacon light and was rotating and singular in nature, while the other source of light was brighter, multicolored and stationary.  i passed the airport and, constantly watching the light, drove about a quarter mile further along the road.  as i neared the second source of light i was able to discern that the source of the light was a vehicle of some kind just off the road and slightly above tree level.  i drew abreast of the object, pulled on to the shoulder of the road and exited my truck.  i walked around to the passenger side of the truck and stared at the craft nearby.   i was both shocked and elated, as it was obviously a ufo i was observing.  (heretofore i was not a believer in these phenomenons.)  the craft was about fifty yards from the road, just above tree-top level.  it was a saucer, elliptical in shape as the top and bottom of the craft did not meet, but ended in a flat side.  there were lights of several colors all about the ship, around the outside, on top and from the bottom.  i estimate its diameter as approximately one hundred feet, based on its close proximity to the trees immediately below it.  it was completely silent, no discernable sound apparent to me.  i observed it for 30 seconds to one minute.  at that time i heard another vehicle approaching from the other direction, and i turned my head for about two seconds to see if the driver was going to stop, which they did not.  i turned back to observe the craft and it was gone.  it was nowhere to be seen.  in order to be hidden from me it would have either had to cloak itself or travel very quickly from view.  at no time during this encounter was any sound emitted from the object.  as i observed it it was in a silent hover about a quarter mile from the dexter airport, directly above an explosive depot for a local business.  i did report the incident to the local newspaper, the watertown daily times.
content.summary: Elliptical disc, 100' diameter, bright lights all around, soundless

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the moonspinner condo's in panama city beach with my husband.  this place is on the gulf of mexico and is right next to st. andrews state park...Very quiet and not light polluted.  we were on the 8th floor balcony closest to the park chatting and looking out at the sky as we spoke.  i saw to the left of my field (toward the park and the canal) a shape flash into my vision.  it was like an elongated nose-snubbed-off candy corn shape with a very bright fire coming out of the back end.  the fire was shaped like a golf tee as if the object rested upon the tee like a golf ball--wide end down.  it was pointing  out to sea and away from the direction of the canal and land.  what struck me most was that as i looked at this object, it was there long enough for me to notice details about it.  i saw the underside of it as if it were a plane flying low.  the underside was wavy like a corregated roof--you know the old fiberglass kind they used to make?  it had 3 ridges and two valleys in this wavy design:  one ridge on either side of the belly and one in the middle separated by the "valleys".  this i saw clearly and it puzzled me for three reasons:  why was i seeing the underbelly of a plane at night so clearly? why did it have a tail of fire or light, and why was it flying so close for me to see these details?  then i realized after it disapppeared as suddenly as it came that it couldn't be a plane.  it didn't make sense.  it shot away out of my vision without any trail of light, with out me being able to see it go.   my husband saw only the flash of light because he was looking at me when i was talking and didn't look up until i stopped talking and stared.  
i have reported this before at the time of the occurance, but i am not sure if it was to your organization.  i am still wondering if there is a way to explain this all away.  i was not imagining this.  it still leaves me wondering.  i have a drawing of what it looked like that i drew back then and will include it.  was it a nasa secret object?  did i see an extraterrestrial object?
content.summary: An object like an elongated snubbed off candy corn shape appeared in the sky above the ocean

content.detailedDescription:
Driving westbound on hwy 98.

it's floating motion.

did not know.

it seemed to be floating, it seemed sort of bowl shaped, reflective, and metallic.

my heart started racing, i slowed down to be able to watch it and drive.

it disappeared.
content.summary: I was driving on hwy 98 westbound, saw something seemingly floating across the sky in a north to south direction. it looked metallic and reflective on the bottom. it then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Feel crazy, but true

i was on vacation in florida to see a girl i as seeing there. i am from chicago, and live in a flight line for midway airport in chicago all my life, so i know planes, helicopters, etc, from other things. 
we were at the beach late, waiting for the time for my flight out of ft. lauderdale, just relaxing and spending time together before i had to leave at 01:30 hours. we were laid back on one of the life guard tower platforms which are closed and on an angle, unlike those in chicago, cali, and other places, where there are stairs. 

anyway, we had not been drinking; she was just asking when i would make another trip back. we were looking east across the ocean, talking and thinking, and that's when a single, orange light caught my eye in the distance. i asked her, "is that a light house of some kind?" but it did not move at all like one would.  she looked and we stared at it, and she wondered as well. it appeared to be off the coast about 3 miles, maybe less, maybe more, but from projection, about 500' to 1000' off the surface, perfectly static in station. we watched for a good ten minutes when a spot light projected across the water. i thought first, police, because parks and lake fronts in chicago close at 11:00pm, and we were going to be forced off. 

yes...I looked or trailing and guiding lights, there were none. it moved slowly and quietly towards us and to the south of us and then just went blank. we looked at each other and laughed, almost dismissing it, until she looked north along the beach and we saw 5, yes five more of them just hanging there, north, off the ocean coast, and yes, the city was still alive, especially since spring break for colleges in the country was just starting. they too hung there, quiet, motionless, however, none shown direct light, only an ambient glow. 3 faded out!!! just there, then gone, and then approx. a mile or less away, one appeared and then the other. no speed, no streaks, just there one moment and then gone. 

we were freaked. we walked up the beach a bit to see; each one looking at the other in quiet wonder and disbelief.  in 10 minutes they were all gone...No flashing lights; no tail rudder lights and no sounds.  they were just there and then nothing. we spent the next 45 minutes in travel, plus the next days via cell phone conversations asking each other, "did you see what i saw?" we both agreed that we did. 

i am not crazy...Don't do drugs, quite intelligent and am not conned easily.  i do believe in other life out there (only a fool would think this would be made for just only us [hence a lot of wasted space]), but i cannot ignore what i saw. this to me was a change, and when i would read other people's stories about sightings and think they were crazy, well, then i must be just as well. 

take it for what you want, but i was an aero-structural-mechanic in the military originally, and did the other thing later...I know aircraft, this was none we have, or anything else. 

well, that's it...I don't know what is out there, but something more than we are is truly there. resubmitting for spelling errors, because when you talk about something most won't believe or be in an agreement of such, well, once types faster than the words can keep up with. 

thank you
content.summary: Multiple objects over the ocean

content.detailedDescription: We were leaving a friend's house in tallahassee, florida. we saw this fireball looking thing flying through the sky. it appeared to be a fireball with something metallic and shiny attached to it. we got out of the car and watched it go across the sky from east to west. it seemed to be very close to the surface. we lost sight of it after it went towards the west, and some trees were blocking our view.
content.summary: A firend and i saw this thing flying through the sky, got out of the car and watched.

content.detailedDescription: I was at a party and me and some friends laid on the grass and looked at the stars then we noticed a " moving star" and it came in from the south it got brighter as it got closer then it blinked a few times then it just disapeared
content.summary: It came in from the south and got brighter as it a got closer then it stopped and it blinked a few times then it just dissapeared
Blueish white, seemed to pulsate, noticed a kind of aura about it. seemed to phaze in and out.

content.detailedDescription: Noticed it in the western sky in approximate port jervis vacinity. i was taking out the trash when i noticed it kind of pulsating and then it would disappear totally then re-appear a few minutes later. went inside and got a digital camcorder to document it. after getting some (so-so) footage the batteries were to low to continue so i shut the camera off and just watched. a minute or two after turning off the camera a fast moving object to the north of my position was moving towards the object. i then turned the camera back on to the "play back" mode just to use the screen as a zoom lense and learned that it was a twin engine jet of the "fighter-interceptor" type. i was an airforce intel ops specialist for some years and had training in recognition so i know a fighter when i see it(dimly lit heat signatures on camcorder screen from engines indicate sub-sonic speed to avoid sonic boom wich i didnt hear). there is stewart airfield in newburgh, n.Y., approximately 20 miles due east of the sighting. after seeing the jet i went back inside to quick charge the battery and told my son to come out but before going back out we looked out a west facing window and observed the jet flying what i know to be a "cap" or combat air patrol in the general vacinity to the south of where the object appeared. we then went back out to video more and as we turned toward the area of the sighting we watched the jet fly off due west never to return, at least for the hour or so we stayed out there. the sphere then reappeared, pulsated, faded in and out then disappeared. it did this repeatedly for some time. i went back inside, my son got in his mothers' vehicle to fend off the cold and continued to video. consequently, every thursday since, if we go outside after dark anywhere from 4 to 6 oddly lighted aircraft (they literally look like "flying police cars" with their pursuit lights on) fly a huge "square" flight path, mostly to the east of but including the area of the sighting. some sound like prop planes, some make no noise at all. at least one of these craft initially left very odd contrails that slowly dispersed and lingered for what seemed like days. ever since the initial sighting these aircraft return every thursday and consequently every weekend my wife seems to have "sinus problems" coincidence? one last item, the wednesday following the initial incident a helocopter passed about a quarter mile away and about 200 feet or so off the ground from our house. it was white underneath and black on the sides and top with no markings or lights what so ever. this occurred at about 3:15 p.M.. the video is shakey at best and was recorded on an old tape that has pictures of my daughter on it. after i edit her i'll make it available.
content.summary: Blueish white, seemed to pulsate, noticed a kind of aura about it. seemed to phaze in and out.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting out on my deck having a cigarette. i noticed the  lights first, because they were much brighter than stars and second, because they seemed to have a very precise placement in the sky...The exact same distance between each. at first there were several in a strange geometric formation, and then after several minutes those faded and i could only see three of them in a straight line, again, all the same distance apart. i didn't know what it was and kept trying to tell myself it was stars or planets, but i've seen this view of the night sky for almost four years and never saw this. i knew it was something unusual and lost sight of it because of coud cover.
content.summary: Saw bright lights evenly spaced in geometric formation and then in straight line

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to texas roadhouse with my family. we were stopped at the stoplight beside starbucks and applebees when i looked up in the sky to see a yellow light going in amazing patterns and at incredible speeds. it went from  fast to slow to completely stopped.(this is was when i new it wasnt a man made object). this went on for about 10 seconds before it disappeared. i was amazed. it was bright yellow in the middle and got lighter as you it got to the edge of the ufo. there was kind of like a light light yellow haze around it.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A yellow light moving in weird patterns and at amazing speeds/ had a light yellow haze around it.

content.detailedDescription:
1) coming out of lunds market wiht groceries, 1 bag with a few items
2) often look up - looked up and saw object hovering to north.
3) knew object was unexplained.  too close and large to be conventional object
4) object was 60 ft long, drifted north until highway 10.  then shot to ne
5) reaction was captivation. got in car and followed object until wit got stuck at light.
6) when wit stuck at traffic light, object shot off to ne.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ce1 - close sighting:  witness follows lenticular disk in car

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east on i-69 leaving flint going torwords swartzcreek mi,then i noticed a glitter in the sky, so i pulled over in my car and, got out and, wached the five dics that were in a triangler position for about two min,then one by one they took off so quick, that i new in my head that they were alien spacecraft of some sort. ive seen strange crafts before, thats why i know the differance between are flying technology and, theres. ive seen nine alien spacecrafts in my lifetime.
content.summary: Seen five discs flouting still over i-69, the sun was relecting off of them like a mirror ,then they were gone in a split of a second.

content.detailedDescription: I was in front of my house,thinking about grass atoms,and i saw a ton of lights reflecting off of a dumpster,i looked up,at first i thought i saw a cluster of planes, but then i remembered that there were never clusters of planes around where i live so i knew i must be seeing ufos. there were: a disc, cigar, egg, star-like, cone and fireball shapes. i thought i saw some blue aliens in a place where they flew the ufos. i also thought i saw green shimering squid-like things. i was very surprised, and wished i never saw it.
content.shape: Cigar,  Cone,  Disc,  Egg,  Fireball,  Star-like
content.summary: I was thinking about grass,it was very dark,they zoomed out of the clouds and back.

content.detailedDescription:
on news years eve, 31 dec 2005 after returning to our cabin in gisborne at 11pm (after only 2 drinks all night!), my japanese girlfriend was admiring the very clear night sky and all the stars, when i looked up also and we both noticed a red glow in the sky, i said to her it's probably mars. we were looking at it and then it started moving across the sky. it was very high up so must have been moving very quickly. it then moved in an irregular zig zag and after about 5 minuets it started to go back in the general direction that it came from, this time straight and started fading until it disappeared. we took a photo but it did not turn out.
 
i am 45 years old and she is 39 and has studied the stars when she was younger, and we have both never seen anything like it. everything that we tried to think it might be did not make sense.
 
the position was south east in the sky above gisborne.
the reaction from me was just to get my girlfriend to take a photo, i did not want to take my eye off what i was seeing. 
would be interested to hear if anyone else saw what we did.
content.summary: Red, looked like mars.

content.detailedDescription: "at 9.30 i went to bed and noticed a very bright sparkling star.  after watching the star for awhile it started sparkling red and white.  i thought it was a helicopter or a satellite.  curiosity made me retrieve my binoculars.  i looked at it and immediately saw a saucer.  it was just hovering for several minutes.  i was in disbelief.  i woke my husband and he said, "thats no plane or satellite."  i said it's a ufo and he agreed.  then he went back to bed - not impressed (he wakes up at 3 am).  at first it was a gassy image.  i watched the ship for several minutes spinning.  i was shaking and in disbelief - had butterflies in my stomach.  the longer i watched the more amazed i became.  the ship was oval and flat with white lights around the bottom.  suddenly two rows of lights were spinning in opposite directions at a rapid pace.  the lights were no longer white, they were were red, yellow, blue, green, white, orange, pink, and purple.  this went on for about 5 minutes and then stopped and just hovered again.  the lights stayed off and suddenly it began shooting off flashes of white light in front of it.  (it was like lightning lighting up the sky in front and above it - or flashes like a camera flash bulb.)  this went on for several minutes, then suddently it shot backward, then forward spinning on its sides - while the colored lights were moving he did this 2 times and then started flashing the lights again - this is whn i noticed a smaller image that appeared to be further up.  they were flashing each other back and forth for over 5 to 10 minutes.  i watched this until the smaller ship disappeared.  the larger ship continued to o the same flashing moving eas and further up in altitude.  i watched it until i could no longer see it.  this "show" in its entirety lasted 60 to 65 minutes."  witness'signed report, dated 10/4/2005
content.summary: Witness sees object like very bright star, then observes it as a dark disk-shaped object with colour-changing rows of lights

content.detailedDescription: At reported date and time i was walking down a unnamed service road parrallel to railroad tracks and grain elevators.Sky was clear, no wind at all, apx. 90 degrees. i looked up to observe object hovering north at apx 4 mph. the object appeared to come off of the top of the grain elevator. object was orb apx 18 inches in diameter about 90 feet off the ground rotating very slowly counter clockwise. object had the same pattern on it as a tennis ball and was colored a greyish-tan.I watched it  for apx 15 minutes as it moved north and slowley gained elevation until it could not be seen.No audible sounds were observed including surrounding area. i have seen alot of strange things in this area, but that was the best observance.
content.summary: Small  sphere eastern colorado
Horizontal band of light, very bright, very sharp edges, moved north to south, stretched across horizon.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside having a cigarette, looking into the sky as i always do, when i saw an object moving pretty rapidly in the night sky. i was attracted at first due to the 4 solid "sodium coloured" lights, not blinking shaped in a triangle, moving away from me, as i could see the shape that the lights made from the craft become narrower due to the distnace it was creating between myself and it. it was a clear night, cold, and i heard no sounds being emitted from it! i watched it pass through the branches of  a tree and decided to change vantage points. once i cleared the tree from my view, i could not see the craft anymore. the lights were bright enough to follow it through the tree branches, but suddenly turned off, or the craft disappeared altogether. it did not posses any marker lights like in aricraft, it was travelling at a faster rate of speed then a commercial jet liner, and i estimated its altitude at a small craft at 3000, or a large craft (boeing 747 size) at 10,000 feet. never seen anything like it before, in all my years of aviation enthusiasm!
content.summary: Exact shape of object undetermined due to night sky with only lights to be seen.

content.detailedDescription:
Auforc report for dissimenation:
two witnesses have reported that at 05:50 this morning they (seperately) saw two silent and orange softly glowing objects proceed nw along the ridgeline of bay's mountain in kingsport.  the lead object(slightly larger than a "bb" at arm's length) proceeded straight and level until it could no longer be seen. the second object followed the first one for some time then suddenly descended almost to the ridgetop then ascended again. within a few seconds, the second object descended to the heavily wooded ridgetop and out of sight.  what makes this sighting interesting is that beyond this ridge lies holston army ammunition depot/ british aerospace.  k.S.
content.summary: Two objects move over bay's mountain, one seems to land?

content.detailedDescription: While going on a mutual aid fire run to the town of hamilton ks i observed from a distance of perhaps 6 or 7 miles what i thought to be lights from their football field.  i realized that the lights were on the wrong side of the highway to be the football field and about twice as high as football field lights.  as i approached in the last of our 4 fire trucks to respond, i reasoned that perhaps it was the hamilton water tower.  i would have left it at that, since we were mainly focusing on getting to the fire, but as we passed by next to this object, it rotated so that its lights faced away from us, and completely vanished.  due to the nature of our trip, we could not stop and investigate further.  i have seen an object similar to this 3 other times.  we were quite close to it, maybe 150 yards or less west of it, and it was not over 200 to 250 feet in the air. i would guess it was about 150 to 200 feet long, and maybe 60 to 70 feet tall, but i can't be sure. it had 4 or 5 very bright white lights on it. i was traveling with a good friend of mine who at the time was the mayor of madison, and i have served on the school board and township board( the point being we are credible people).  several others saw this object, but no one wanted to talk about it.  i am reporting it now after watching some ufo programs on the history channel and after seeing a similar object about 3 months ago. i expect the exact times and dates could be found by checking the gw county sheriffs dispatch logs as to when we were dispatched.  i do know that i had been watching a debate between bush and gore when the call came in.   brian hind.
content.summary: Saw extremely large well lit object app. 250 ft above the town of hamilton ks while responding to a fire.

content.detailedDescription: 01/27/06 at appx. 2040 hours i was at work in city of cerritos, california, which is about 15 miles southeast of downtown los angeles. i was outside and had a clear view of the sky in all directions. the sky was clear and visbility was as far as i can describe, unlimited.  there were numerous commerical aircraft visible in several directions, mostly in the lax pattern. while speaking with a coworker, i noticed a red light in the northern sky. it appeared to be a planet or star but the red color was brilliant and remarkable, as reds usually disipate over distance. i will do my best to give a more detailed explanation of its location: when i noticed it, it was about 25 degrees west of north and about 30 degrees above the horizon. it appeared to be either a high flying aircraft at distance or a star/planet, but as i said, the red color was intense. the light appeared to flicker or strobe, but not in any regular pattern. i thought it may have been affected by the same condition that makes stars "twinkle", air currents and temperature changes.  while in conversation with my co-worker, i watched the "thing", probably because it appeared so brightly yet so apparently high in altitude.  i noticed that it was moving from west to east, very slowly. slow enough that it took maybe 10-15 minutes to go appx. 45 degrees across the sky. i remarked to myself that some of the pilots of the multiple aircraft in the area must see it, if i could see it from the ground. i watched alone while speaking with the coworker, but finally mentioned it to him/her at about 2050 hours. at that point it was almost directly north. there was no detectable noise from it, and it moved so slowly that its movement was almost indistinguishable.  once i mentioned it, we both watched it and tried to identify it. i am not a pilot, but i believe that the red light on an aircraft going from left to right would be on the opposite side of the fuselage. the "thing" moved at a constant altitude, which was totally indistinguishable due to the lack of noise, brightness of the "thing" and slow speed. we watched for about 5 more minutes until it was about 15 degrees east of north. we both discussed it, trying to determine what it was. suddenly, at about 2055, it either dived towards the ground or turned northbound at a very high rate of speed until it was out of sight, which took less than five seconds. it was moving very quickly. either way, it appeared to be going "down" in relation to where i was standing. still, no noise. once it began to move away (or down), it changed color to a whitish, more like an aircraft light. i still did not notice any flashing anti-collision lights or green/red orientation lights like a commercial or private aircraft would display. i had no recording/video equipment, but even if i had, i don't think that it would have been useful due to the small size and lack of gross movements of the object until it left our view. at no point could i see any detail as to the shape, size or actual speed of this thing. i don't believe that what we saw was necessarily a anything special, but i'm sure that someone in a city this large must have seen it. please contact my email address with any questions.
content.summary: Red colored light similar to star or high aircraft moved slowly from west to east and then either dived or flew north at high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to work,early morning around 4.35 a.M. driving my car.The night was dark and clear.I live in the country and there are alot of trees along side of the road big redwood trees you dont have a wide open veiw.Traveling up a curvey road this bright orange light caught my attention it was to my right behind the trees there are a couple of houses in the same area where i saw this orange light. the light was hovering above the houses maybe sixty feet above or more.It looked like it was round in shape but the trees broke up the the hole shape it was two times bigger than a full moon,it had darker orange vein like lines coming from the bottom they were not straight lines they were vein looking.I only got to look at it for 10 seconds then it was like someone turned off a switch it was gone.
content.summary: Sighting while driving to work in the early am

content.detailedDescription: We were out side with friends when we saw object heading to the north,but very slow as if it were looking for something,but it then headed out over the west ,we think it may have gone out over the gulf,then it moved very fast ,till we could no longer see it.  this object was very big and made no noise. what was it?
content.summary: Saw very bright orange/ white cylinder type or cigar shape thing

content.detailedDescription: A friend of mine alan and myself were taking out the garbage. it was night time. we were young so we each had one side of the garbage can. as we opened the door,@ the village two condo's where my father was the maintenance man, we both saw the star like spere with spikes. it sat stationary approx. 20 feet above the parking lot. it made no noise and seemed to emit no light wich seemed odd because it appeared to be made of light. it's edges i remember well because they were so sharp. they, to me, looked absolutely perfect and symmetrical to the atom. it was the most beautiful thing i have ever seen. the sphere with the spikes looked large. it's longer spikes were probably 3.5 to 4.0 feet long. the spere was probably 1.5 to two feet wide. so it may have been up to 10 ft. from point to point. we both stared, jaws dropped, for a minute or two. i then ran inside to get my father. " dad, dad come quick!" i said. "hold on son just a sec." he replied. come on! come on! i exclaimed. "what is it son?"  "dad theres a ufo or something outside!" he finally ran back with alan and myself to the front door. the object however was already gone. years later, approx. 10, on the way back from the beach another friend and myself saw a similiar object. it was a similiar sphere only this one was about .8 of a foot across. he got a better view. i was looking at the girl in the back seat. i saw what looked like three or four different patterns of spikes emitted from the small sphere in only a split second. it , from the corner of my eye, looked like it almost hit the car so i looked out the back window for the object instead of turning around but i did not see it. i then turned from looking at the back seat and sat down. i waited for a while observing the oncoming car lights and streetlights. i knew that neither was what i had just witnessed. i turned towards jeremy to tell him what i saw. he was looking forward with both hands on the wheel. he had a funny smirk on his face. he looked over at me, i was already looking at him, and he said, " man your not going to believe this but a star thing just flew over the car." he said he could see it off in the distance as it swooped downwards and headed straight for our car. i would guess that it was only 3/4 of a  foot above the car as it passed over. jeremy said it was spinning as it flew. during both occasions i had no doubt that what i was seeing was either angelic or extraterrestrial and definately not man made. would you please let me no if you have had similiar reports or know what you think i might have seen? p.S. the second sighting was on the way to houston from surfside beach. circa 1989.
content.summary: A friend and myself, while taking out the garbage, opened the front door and both saw a perfectly white sphere approx. 1.5 to twice the size of a basketball with different sized spikes of white light  protruding from sphere.

content.detailedDescription:
1) i was outside my house relaxing on my birthday

2) i noticed a strange orange light in the sky, not everyday you see that

3) i have to admit that at first i thought it was a meteor or shooting. but that seemed impossible because if something like that was coming down towards earth it would probably leave a mark.

4)it appeared from behind the clouds and kinda coasted down towards the ground until it dissappeared over the horizon.

5)i was mystified during and after the sighting, although none of us felt odd or nervous about the event. there was no time loss.

6)as i said it dissappeared behind the horizon.

i do not have any photos of it becuase it was going too fast and i did not want to miss it.
content.summary: Orange light about the 1/10 the size of the moon from my prespective

content.detailedDescription: While behind my home with my hi-8 video camera, i spotted a bright object within the star formation of the big dipper.  .  i turned on the camera and followed this object for 36 seconds.  i zoomed in slightly on the object and kept the same magnification throughout the filming.  i was shocked when, 30+ seconds into the filming, another bright object enters the cameras field of view from the top/left, of the view finder.  it moves in at a great speed, intersecting with the first object.  both come together (as one).When played back in slow motion, the objects take on the shape of discs and multiply to 4 discs, then 3, then 2 then merge as one, disappearing into the night.  event filmed with infra-red.
content.summary: Bright object moves  right to left, intercepted by a second object, both disappear

content.detailedDescription:
Two bright orange lights in sky at low to moderate altitude near 580/680 hwy - maneuvering very differently compared to aircraft landing lights.  erratic movement - sometimes merging together then separating.  seen from moving vehicle.  seen by witness many different times each evening at different times of the evening. tonight's maneuvers of these objects strangest yet, prompting this report.  

conditions - night sky/clear with thin overcast/ bright stars clearly seen.  moderate to low suburban light polution. 

1. in vehicle driving.
2. bright orange 'landing like' lights.  erratic movements of objects, merging and separating at times low to ground. 
3. orange aircraft landing lights.
4. objects would fly eratic coarse changes at a constant speed.  sometimes lights would merge into one object, then separate apart and continue flying low to ground. 20 degree elevation to horizon.  seem objects in same area of sky almost every eveinging leaving work for home in union city.  same objects appearing at different times, always on drive home.
5. driving away in traffic, sometimes objects fade away. 

witness had a close encounter (ce-1) with a large disk object hovering over a dublin car dealership in same area on a friday, november 5, 2004.  this case completed by steve reichmuth mufon ssd- alameda co./ on july 15, 2005 case # jsr-0011   case conclusion - unknown object. 

this report submitted by steve reichmuth ssd - alameda co. based on witness report/telephone interview made on jan 27, 2006 (20:48 hours) pacific st .
content.summary: Two bright orange lights in sky low near 580/680 hwy - maneuvering very differently compared to aircraft landing lights.  erratic movement - sometimes merging together then separating.  seen from moving vehicle.

content.detailedDescription: i was with a friend on a trampoline waiting for another friend to get some cloths. i was looking up in the sky then i saw 3 red lights above some trees (i thought it was a airplane but i kept looking).During the sighting i felt scared because it had to of been about 20 or 30 feet above us. when i first saw it i only saw 3 lights two next to eachother and one over the other. about 5 minuits after i noticed it i couldnt see it anymore because it went behind some trees. then about another 5 munuits later it came back over the trees going very slowly and went right above us and it was pretty close to the ground. after it past us we watched it go over to a big feild next to us and then we went to go get our friend to show her and we came out then it was gone. no where to be seen
content.summary: Had lights outlining it with one light in the middle

content.detailedDescription: Daytime. boston. it was a very windy day and the clouds were racing from west to east. myself and at least four others witnessed a silver, shiny, metallic looking object of unknown size coming from the south and moving in a north/northwesterly direction over the masspike in the allston area. i'm a pilot. i know what airplanes and helicopters look like in the daytime and night time. this was neither. as for balloon? it was not. a balloon at that altitude would have moved with the wind. which would have been towards the east on that day. this was moving very slowly in almost the opposite direction- in a north/northwesterly direction( obviously controlled and under it's own power). we observed it and talked about it for at least five minutes. we were unable to determine its actual size or altitude except to say it was below cloudlevel. there were no referances to size, since we observed an object that was neither an airplane nor a helicopter. and there was nothing near it to make a determination as to its size. it appeared small and reflective and under its own power. maintaining its altitude which was very high, but below cloudlevel. this lasted for at least five minutes,perhaps more, when it suddenly disappeared. any claim to it being a balloon also disappeared at that point. because balloons move with the wind, especially on a windy day, and not against it. it vanished.
content.summary: Siver/metallic looking object moving slowly .

content.detailedDescription: I was at my house watching tv when i heard my dog barking crazy, i went out to see what hapened and i saw a strange light like 20 meters away from the house, after that it stayed there for like ten minutes, it didn't did anithing but after that time it started to get up and then i didn't saw nothing
content.summary: A strange light got close to the house but after a while it started to get away at a incredible speed
